summary: Staff-level Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering scalable, high-performance applications across FinTech, Crypto, and EdTech. Expert in React, TypeScript, and modern architecture with deep experience in design systems, real-time UIs, and mobile-first products. Proven mentor and technical leader, known for guiding teams, launching end-to-end products, and improving developer velocity at scale.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
points: Led the rebuild of District Landing Pages to enable non-devs to manage content.
Developed Hazel's video/screenshare platform, replacing third-party tools.
Contributed critical fixes to apps used by 1M+ students across 225+ districts.
Improved CI/CD with GitHub Actions, onboarding scripts, and PR templates.
Mentored 4 engineers and introduced a new review process for frontend teams.

experience.title: Technical Lead / Staff Frontend Engineer
points: Led UI for order book, trade tickets, and live account updates.
Tuned WebSocket data to balance performance with real-time UX.
Worked daily with backend teams and weekly with design for product alignment.
Built Storybook components and improved Redux state handling.
Mentored 4 devs and guided architecture decisions on high-traffic systems.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
points: Built the Marketplace, NFT Collection, and Trade Flow for NFL All Day.
Integrated Flow blockchain for live NFT state and trading validation.
Managed complex state logic with XState and blockchain event handling.
Handled high concurrency traffic during major NFL NFT releases.
Collaborated in a small, senior team to deliver a top-tier Web3 launch.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
points: Owned the core trade path during the shift from monolith to microservices.
Redesigned trading ticket to streamline user flow and boost completion rate.
Worked with 9+ teams to coordinate architecture and API alignment.
Achieved 100% accessibility and near-total test coverage on all modules.
Mentored 3 junior developers and improved cross-team component sharing.

experience.title: Founder, Developer, Educator
points: Built and launched a mobile-first financial education app using Firebase and Stripe.
Created all video, visual, and course content with custom backend and UI design.
Reached 3,000+ users, 200k+ views, and maintained a 4.6+ app store rating.
Worked with external editors and a Kotlin engineer to speed delivery and solve edge cases.
Shipped a full MVP in 6 months, combining engineering, UX, and product growth.

experience.title: Technical Lead / Staff Frontend Engineer
points: Led frontend development of Hydro, a blockchain-based 2FA identity app.
Integrated Ethereum smart contracts and light wallets using Trust Wallet.
Built secure login flows and decentralized auth across mobile devices.
Managed frontend team and worked closely with 6 backend devs and 2 designers.
Achieved 30k+ downloads and Product Hunt recognition, contributing to $50M+ market cap.

experience.title: Front-End Software Developer (R&D Lead)
points: Promoted from intern to R&D lead, focused on enhancing UX and screen time.
Invented and owned Digital Cover Stories, leading design-to-dev for 2+ years.
Built a custom CMS to allow non-devs to create parallax SPA stories.
Introduced React and Node.js to modernize frontend stack company-wide.
Led a team of 3 devs and partnered closely with designers and editorial.

achievements.title: A True Mentor
achievements.description: Mentored 15+ engineers, improved team onboarding, and introduced review workflows to boost delivery speed and code quality.

achievements.title: The Product Launcher
achievements.description: Led the architecture and release of full-stack products from concept to launch, including frontend, backend, and integration work.

achievements.title: Integrated System Designer
achievements.description: Built reusable component libraries and design systems used across multiple teams to ensure visual consistency and faster development.
